LightningComponentBundle.description: Given a collection of account audit history rows, this component will display a table and allow the user to select a row that will be returned as an output.

property.name: auditRowsAccount
property.label: Account Audit History List
property.description: A collection of audit entries for accounts

property.name: selectedAuditRowAccount
property.label: Account Audit Row Chosen
property.description: An audit entry selected by the user
